course_title: Working with Vulnerable Populations Globally, Regionally, or Locally
class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 3 students only.
course_description: This course supports immersive clinical experiences with vulnerable populations in various global, regional, or local locations. Students will explore health challenges within the social, cultural, political, and economic factors that influence health outcomes.
sections: Class Nbr: 4201, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Th 2-4p, Instructor: A. Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
